sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './workExperience.css' import mainWorkList from './index.data' const WorkExperience = () => { const eachWork = (workList) => { return workList.map(eachItem => { return (
{eachItem.company}

{eachItem.title}

{eachItem.description}

{eachItem.title}

{eachItem.date}

{eachItem.company}
{eachItem.location}
) }) } return (
Work Experience {eachWork(mainWorkList)}
) } export default WorkExperience
